# no-prefix-interview-test Spec

## Goal
Replace three workflow nodes with a single skill node to streamline the system architecture while maintaining existing functionality.

## Success Criteria
- Interview specifications continue to function without modification
- Plan flows execute identically to the current three-node implementation
- No regression in approval gate behavior
- Routing logs continue to be generated correctly

## Current State
The existing system consists of three workflow node

- Ensure no regression in routing functionality during and after consolidation
